divs: Sighting DetailsNarrative below was submitted by MUFON Dispatch for witness based on phone conversation with witness. As I was driving over a bridge I saw directly ahead of me an extremely bright, bluish-white light low in the sky, which seemed to be standing still. As I crested the top of the bridge and began driving down the other side, the light appeared to blink out.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around November 1st 2009
Summary: Bluish-white light just above treetop level
